item.title: jackc/pgx
item.description: import ( "context" "database/sql" _ "github.com/jackc/pgx/v5/stdlib" "github.com/wroge/sqlt" ) type Book struct { ID int64 Title string } type Query struct { Title string } var queryBook = sqlt.First[Query, Book](sqlt.Dollar, sqlt.Parse(` SELECT id {{ ScanInt64 "ID" }} , title {{ ScanString "Title" }} FROM books WHERE title = {{ .Title }} `)) db, err := sql.Open("pgx", "user=postgres password=secret host=localhost port=5432 database=pgx_test sslmode=disable") if err != nil { return err } book, err := queryBook.
